title: The Problem is life
creator_credit: Peter Hollander, Ben Park and United Nations Television
brief_description: With help from the UN, India has started a cast birth control programme. Focuses on a village where free contraceptive information is supplied, and films a vasectomy, which so far has proven the most successful method of contraception in India.
